sections.heading: Power
sections.text: of Governor to request information, issue subpoenas and enter contracts.

sections.heading: Proclamation
sections.text:
of emergency: Determination by Governor; notice and hearing in area affected in

certain circumstances; filing.

sections.heading: Powers
sections.text: of Governor upon proclamation of emergency.

sections.heading: Confidentiality
sections.text:
of information furnished at request of Governor; protective order; penalty for

disclosure.

sections.heading: Variance
sections.text:
from regulation or order: Procedures for application and hearing; judicial

review.

sections.heading: Filing
sections.text:
notice of official action; period of effectiveness of official action; issuance

of new declaration of emergency upon expiration of prior declaration.

sections.heading: Penalties
sections.text: for violation of regulation or order.
